Now she was reading the minds of some wild Pokemon to kind a nice one that would be her friend. Just as she caught a nice Medicham that wanted to befriend her, she doubled over before straightening out. She felt her mouth moving into a grin, although it wasn't her in control of her body anymore. She started to fight against the force that took control of her body. When Ash felt the mind of Liza resisting against his control, he was only a little surprised. He began something of a mental battle with Liza, and at first her powers gave her the upper hand. But soon, Liza's Psychic powers began to ebb away into Ash's soul. She lost all the ability to fight Ash's control. With the last bit of power she had, she sent a call for help to Tate. Ash grinned from ear to ear when he felt the resistance from Liza fade. He felt her Psychic powers become his as the thought of the Pokemon around him become open to him. He felt Liza's mind in the back of his head, and easily penetrated her now weak mind. He looked through her memories to find what else her powers could do. He began to slightly panic when he saw that she sent a message for help to Tate. Soon he felt a presence come near him. It was ...
1513321.title: Psy Switch

Tate turns to Ash and asks "Find any Pokemon?" It seemed that Tate didn't get Liza's message for help. Quickly searching Liza's memory, he saw she had caught a Medicham, and shows it to Tate. He nods in approval, and you both fall into silence. Ash felt a gentle push on his mind, and assume it's from Tate. He allows him to link minds with him, though cutting Tate off from any thoughts that would clue him into Ash's Possession. Suddenly, the door to their gym opened and in stepped the challenger. After a long battle, Wally managed to take both Ash and Tate down. Tate walked over and have him the Mind Badge, and Ash gave him TM04, Calm Mind. info.brief_description: Ash - a loser who gains the ability to possess others. Mayhem ensues. PLEASE ADD!
info.description:
Ash is the new kid at school. An instant loser at school, he somehow gains the ability to project his spirit into others. His body goes limp when he possesses someone else, but he can control it like a puppet with mental strings.

He can possess anyone he wants to.
This is a TG story, so have fun!
Do whatever you want (sex, etc.) but try to keep proper English.

Please Add! and review.

I see some chapters done in short form, so I try to edit them to look proper. Please don't let that discourage you from adding more.

I don't own Pokemon or anything related.
